dropApproval().details: Drop approval of AAVE to the Staked Aave contract in case of emergency.

emergencyWithdrawal(address,address,uint.details: Perform an emergency token withdrawal only callable by the Rewards admin

params.to: Address of the recipient of the withdrawal
params.token: Address of the token to withdraw funds from this contract

returns._0: Returns the address of the Incentives Controller
Returns the address of the Rewards admin
Underlying token address from the stake contract

performTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: Perform custom transfer logic via delegate call from source contract to a TransferStrategy implementation

params.amount: Amount to transfer to the "to" address parameter

returns._0: Returns true bool if transfer logic succeeds

renewApproval().details: Perform a MAX_UINT approval of AAVE to the Staked Aave contract.
